title: Video: How to escape from the indie dev shame spiral
text:
Video: How to escape from the indie dev shame spiral 
Published By: Gamasutra.com - Today 
Game designer & consultant Ethan Levy explores a phenomenon he calls the "indie shame spiral"-and how to escape it -- in this brief GDC 2015...
